name: R5_v2_0178_for_R4
title: Cross-version VS for R5.Hl7VSFileLevelEventCode for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version ValueSet represents concepts from http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v2-0178|2.0.0 for use in FHIR R4. Concepts not present here have direct `equivalent` mappings crossing all versions from R5 to R4.

concept.display: Replace current version of this master file with the version contained in this message
Change file records as defined in the record-level event codes for each record that follows
